Articles.Content:
I watched stream a week or so ago and the stream was able to tuck away some arms on his space station by using some kind of hinge module. I can't seem to find it can anyone point me where the module is or how this is done?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-12T16:26:13Z" title="06/12/2015 04:26  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 12, 2015</time> by rollo1002**

Are you referring to the official KSP Twitch channel, or an unaffiliated user simply streaming his/her own gameplay?

[MSI Infernal Robotics](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116064-1-0-2-Magic-Smoke-Industries-Infernal-Robotics-0-21-2) is an add-on that provides hinges and other robotic actuators.

This was on the official KSP twitch channel and after looking at the video on the mode you posted it was this that he was using.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-12T16:25:45Z" title="06/12/2015 04:25  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 12, 2015</time> by rollo1002**
